Uses of Class
uber.Trip

  • Packages that use Trip 
    Package Description
    uber  

    • Uses of Trip in uber

      Methods in uber that return Trip 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Trip UberApp.createRandomTrip(Passenger passenger, java.util.List<Driver> drivers)
      Creates a trip with a randomly selected destination within the grid
      static Trip UberApp.createTrip(Passenger passenger, Location dest, java.util.List<Driver> drivers)
      Creates a Trip for a given Passenger based on the given List of Drivers Sorts Drivers by proximity and has them accept/decline in priority order Informs Passenger when a Driver accepts request or when all Drivers have declined
      Methods in uber that return types with arguments of type Trip 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.List<Trip> UberApp.runTrips(UsersList users)
      Creates and runs trips for all Passengers based on the given set of users Utilizes various helper methods in this class Multithreading allows Trips to run in parallel
      Methods in uber with parameters of type Trip 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static org.json.simple.JSONObject UberIO.encodeTrip(Trip trip)
      Helper method for tripLog() encodes a single Trip as a JSON object
      static void UberApp.executeTransaction(Trip trip)
      Alters the balance of a Trip's Driver and Passenger Cancels the Trip if the Passenger has insufficient balance Passenger pays fare, Driver receives 3/4 of fare Structurally may have fit better in Trip class, but informing Passengers makes it fit better organizationally in this class
      Method parameters in uber with type arguments of type Trip 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void UberIO.finalOutput(java.util.List<Trip> trips, UsersList users, java.lang.String fileName)
      Creates a final output text file
      static void UberIO.tripLog(java.util.List<Trip> trips, java.lang.String fileName)
      Saves all trips as a JSON file Currently saves all data on one line; attempt to find way to format data onto multiple lines
